name: switchboard
description: Cost-optimize AI agent operations by routing tasks to appropriate models based on complexity
author: digitalhustla

required.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
required.description: OpenRouter API key for model routing â€” add to ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json as 'openrouter_api_key' field. Get at openrouter.ai/keys

endpoints.description: OpenRouter API for multi-model routing and inference

privacy_notes: Some models may log prompts/completions for training (e.g., Aurora Alpha, Free Router).
Do not route secrets, API keys, or private PII through free or unmoderated models.
Review model privacy policies at openrouter.ai/docs before use.
